house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1979 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include patio, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, Garage Door Opener, Microwave
